name: Command & Conquer 3: Tiberium Wars
notes:
This will install C&C3 Tiberium Wars from a DVD. Copy the contents of the DVD to a folder in your home directory and run 'setup.exe' from that copy.

Download the v1.09 patch and execute that from the wineprefix after install has completed.

Subsequently, you may wish to download a NO-CD crack.
content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/Command & Conquer 3/CNC3.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: nocrashdialog win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Setting OS as Windows 7.
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win7
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1280x720
